title: Truvestor
subtitle: AI-powered investing dashboard for sentiment analysis, portfolio tracking, and smart notifications, built and powered with these technologies:

tech.name: Next.js
tech.description: Framework for server‐rendered React applications and static site generation.

tech.name: React
tech.description: Component-based UI library for building interactive frontends.

tech.name: TypeScript
tech.description: Typed superset of JavaScript for safer, more maintainable code.

tech.name: Supabase
tech.description: Backend as a Service providing PostgreSQL, Auth, and realtime subscriptions.

tech.name: Recharts
tech.description: Charting library built with React components for data visualization.

tech.name: GSAP
tech.description: Animation library for high-performance UI transitions.

tech.name: OpenAI API
tech.description: Used GPT-3.5 Turbo for real-time sentiment analysis of financial news.

tech.name: TanStack Query
tech.description: Data-fetching library for caching, deduping, and synchronizing server state.

contentHtml:
Truvestor provides real-time sentiment scores by fetching financial news via the OpenAI API, analyzing articles against user portfolios, and visualizing results with interactive Recharts dashboards.

Built on Next.js with Supabase for authentication and realtime data syncing, the platform uses GSAP for smooth animations and TanStack Query for resilient, cache-first data fetching.

title: Promptly
subtitle: AI agent marketplace with pay-per-use access, real-time GPT-4 execution, and workspace management. Built and powered with these technologies:

tech.name: Next.js
tech.description: React framework used for routing, server rendering, and static generation.

tech.name: React
tech.description: Frontend library for building interactive and reusable UI components.

tech.name: TypeScript
tech.description: Typed superset of JavaScript enabling safer, more predictable code.

tech.name: Supabase
tech.description: Used for user authentication and session management.

tech.name: MongoDB
tech.description: Document database used for storing agents, users, and run history.

tech.name: Redis + BullMQ
tech.description: Used for background job processing and agent execution queues.

tech.name: OpenAI API
tech.description: GPT-4 used for running agent tasks and generating user-facing output.

tech.name: Stripe
tech.description: Payment processing platform used for purchasing agent runs securely.

contentHtml:
Promptly is a full-stack AI agent marketplace that lets users browse, preview, and pay to run GPT-4–powered agents. Each agent can be purchased as a one-off run via Stripe, tracked via a tokenized usage system, and executed in real-time using BullMQ queues.

The platform features full workspace and run history management, secure access control, and a scalable backend powered by MongoDB and Redis. Watch Live Demo Here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=seclyxy1ogA/p>

title: Son Of a Tailor
subtitle: Custom-made e-commerce platform for fitted clothing, offering a seamless sizing and ordering experience, built with:

tech.name: Vue.js
tech.description: Progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.

tech.name: Nuxt.js
tech.description: Vue framework for server-side rendering and powerful static site generation.

tech.name: Emotion
tech.description: CSS-in-JS library for writing performant, scoped styles with JavaScript.

tech.name: Webpack
tech.description: A powerful bundler that compiles JavaScript modules and assets.

tech.name: PWA
tech.description: Progressive Web App support for offline access, fast loading, and installability.

tech.name: Open Graph
tech.description: Enables rich social media previews by embedding metadata in web pages.

tech.name: Sentry
tech.description: Real-time error tracking and monitoring to improve application reliability.

tech.name: Google Cloud CDN
tech.description: Global content delivery network for reducing latency and improving performance.

tech.name: HTTP/3
tech.description: Next-gen HTTP protocol for faster and more reliable web performance.

contentHtml:
Son Of a Tailor offers a step-by-step sizing wizard powered by modern Vue and Nuxt technologies, letting users input measurements and preview custom fits in real time.

With Emotion for styling, Webpack for performance optimization, and Sentry for error monitoring, the app delivers a smooth, reliable e-commerce experience enhanced by PWA support and HTTP/3 delivery via Google Cloud CDN.

testimonial.quote: The custom sizing wizard is so intuitive—I've never shopped for clothes this seamlessly.
testimonial.author: Emma Johansson, Fashion Blogger

title: X Clone
subtitle: Full-stack clone of Twitter’s X platform with real-time feeds, authentication, and engagement features, built with:

tech.name: Next.js
tech.description: Hybrid static & server rendering for optimal performance.

tech.name: React
tech.description: Modular UI components and hooks for state management.

tech.name: TypeScript
tech.description: Type safety and auto-complete in IDE.

tech.name: Firebase
tech.description: Realtime database and Cloud Firestore for live feeds and notifications.

tech.name: Tailwind CSS
tech.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

tech.name: NextAuth.js
tech.description: Authentication solution with support for OAuth providers.

contentHtml:
X Clone mimics the core experience of Twitter X, featuring real-time posting and feed updates via Firebase Cloud Firestore and authentication through NextAuth.js.

The UI is styled with Tailwind CSS, and the app uses Next.js edge functions to handle serverless comment and like endpoints.

title: Enigma
subtitle: Headless WooCommerce frontend built with Next.js, optimized for performance and flexibility, utilizing:

tech.name: Next.js
tech.description: SSG and ISR for ultra-fast page loads on product listings.

tech.name: React
tech.description: Reusable components for product cards and checkout flow.

tech.name: TypeScript
tech.description: Typed APIs and props for predictable builds.

tech.name: WooCommerce REST API
tech.description: Headless connection to WordPress backend for product and cart management.

tech.name: CSS Modules
tech.description: Scoped styling for theme consistency.

contentHtml:
Enigma fetches product data from a headless WooCommerce backend via REST API, rendering listings and dynamic filters with Next.js ISR for near-instant updates.

Cart state is managed client-side, with checkout flows routed through WooCommerce’s secure endpoints, all styled via CSS Modules for maintainability.

testimonial.quote: Performance is outstanding—browsing feels instant and checkout couldn’t be smoother.
testimonial.author: Carlos Mendes, Senior Frontend Developer at Enigma

title: Heineken Concept
subtitle: Creative landing page design for Heineken using GSAP and smooth animations to showcase products and brand, built with:

tech.name: Vue.js
tech.description: Reactive UI framework for component composition.

tech.name: GSAP
tech.description: Advanced scroll-triggered animations for immersive experience.

tech.name: Locomotive Scroll
tech.description: Smooth scrolling library for parallax effects.

tech.name: CSS Modules
tech.description: Scoped styles for modular component theming.

contentHtml:
This Heineken concept page leverages GSAP ScrollTrigger for bottle animations and Locomotive Scroll for smooth parallax sections, all orchestrated in Vue components.

The design focuses on brand colors and interactive taste notes sections, with modular CSS Modules ensuring clean, conflict-free styles.

title: AI-Video Bot
subtitle: Automated video content generation tool using AI scripts and voice synthesis for short-form video platforms, built with:

tech.name: Node.js
tech.description: Runtime for backend script execution and scheduling.

tech.name: Express
tech.description: Minimal web framework to expose generation endpoints.

tech.name: OpenAI API
tech.description: Generates video scripts via GPT-3.5 Turbo.

tech.name: FFmpeg
tech.description: Command-line tool for stitching audio/video assets.

tech.name: Google Cloud Text-to-Speech
tech.description: Synthesizes voiceovers for generated scripts.

contentHtml:
The AI-Video Bot backend uses the OpenAI API to draft video scripts, then calls Google Cloud Text-to-Speech for voiceovers and FFmpeg to assemble final MP4 files.

An Express server exposes endpoints to trigger generation on demand or via scheduled cron jobs, all orchestrated in Node.js.

title: Sports Arbitrage
subtitle: Real-time sports arbitrage calculator and alert system for bettors to capitalize on odds differences, built with:

tech.name: React
tech.description: Live odds dashboard and user interface components.

tech.name: Next.js
tech.description: Server‐side rendering for SEO-friendly pages.

tech.name: TypeScript
tech.description: Static typing for calculation logic.

tech.name: WebSockets
tech.description: Push updates for real-time odds streaming.

tech.name: Node.js
tech.description: Backend service for arbitrage calculations and alerts.

contentHtml:
Sports Arbitrage fetches live odds via WebSockets, runs comparison algorithms in Node.js, and displays profitable opportunities in a React/Next.js dashboard.

Users can set custom thresholds for alerts; the backend pushes notifications when arbitrage windows open.
